text: Pir Mahal railway station (, ) is located in town of Pir Mahal district of Toba Tek Singh, Pakistan. ==See also== * List of railway stations in Pakistan * Pakistan Railways ==References== ==External links== *Official Web Site of Pakistan Railways Category:Railway stations in Toba Tek Singh District Category:Railway stations on Shorkot–Sheikhupura line
title: Pir Mahal railway station
